links.title: Joint Development of Principles to Guide Development of Cross-Border Electricity Trade

content.content: Joint Development of Principles to Guide Development of Cross-Border Electricity Trade

Singapore and Australia have jointly developed “Ten Principles to Guide the Development of Cross-Border Electricity Trade” to deepen energy connectivity and support Cross-Border Electricity Trading (CBET). This was announced at the 9th Singapore-Australia Annual Leaders’ Meeting in Melbourne, Australia on 5 March 2024, in the opening remarks by Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong and Australia Prime Minister Anthony Albanese.
Please click here for the full factsheet.
MINISTRY OF TRADE AND INDUSTRY 5 MARCH 2024
